    • createAlbum

      public boolean createAlbum(String albumName)
      Creates a new album for this user.
      Parameters:
      albumName - the name of the album to create
      Returns:
      true if album was created, false if it already exists

    • deleteAlbum

      public boolean deleteAlbum(String albumName)
      Deletes an album by name.
      Parameters:
      albumName - the name of the album to delete
      Returns:
      true if album was deleted, false if not found

    • renameAlbum

      public boolean renameAlbum(String oldName, String newName)
      Renames an album.
      Parameters:
      oldName - the current album name
      newName - the new album name
      Returns:
      true if renamed, false if new name exists or old not found

      albumName - the album to add to

      public boolean createAlbumFromSearch(String albumName, List<Photo> photos)
      Creates a new album from a list of photos (e.g., search results).

      photos - the list of photos to add
      Returns:
